thread.title: Two suspected robbers killed in Bogra 'shootout'
thread.title_full: Two suspected robbers killed in Bogra 'shootout'

title: Two suspected robbers killed in Bogra 'shootout'
text:
Two suspected robbers killed in Bogra 'shootout' Bogra Correspondent, bdnews24.com Published: 2017-02-08 10:17:11.0 BdST Updated: 2017-02-08 10:56:20.0 BdST Police in Bogra have reported the death of two persons in what is being described as a shootout. 
The victims of the incident at the northern district's Kahalu Upazila early on Wednesday have been identified as 'Dulal', 45 and 'Ibrahim', 50. 
Kahalu police OC Nur Alam said the two belonged to a robbers' gang. 
He told bdnews24.com that they had received reports of a robbery-in-progress at Panchteer area around 1am. "The robbers opened fire as soon as our team reached the spot. Police retaliated when two robbers died on the spot." 
Police said they have seized a pistol, five rounds of ammunition and some sharp weapons from the scene.
